DOC.brief_summary: There around 60 000 birth annually Finland . Around 1-5 % vaginal delivery Finland complicate Grade III- IV perineal tear . Because diagnosis sphincter lesion birth challenge total amount woman obtain sphincter lesion could even grater . The aim study compare different tool diagnosis obstetric anal sphincter injury . In hope achieve early diagnosis pathology thus facilitate early treatment possible sphincter defect .
